## Related Rates

This is always differentiation wrt time

for $f(x)$

$\frac{d~[f(x)]}{dt} = \frac{df(x)}{dx} \cdot \frac{dx}{dt}$, (Chain Rule)

$\frac{dx}{dt} = \frac{1}{d~[f(x)]} \cdot \frac{d~[f(x)]}{dt}$
